description: Welcome to Farm Fusion, your ideal destination in the world of agriculture and animal production.
contactSubtitle: Have questions about livestock care, crop management, or agricultural solutions? Our team of experts is here to help you grow and succeed.
messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help with your farming or animal care needs...
chatWelcomeMessage: Hello! How can I help you with your animal or agriculture questions today?
defaultBotResponse: I'll have someone from our team get back to you on this question.
livestockBotResponse: Our livestock specialists can help with animal health, breeding, and management questions. Would you like me to connect you with a specialist?
cropBotResponse: Our crop experts can provide guidance on planting, fertilization, pest management, and harvesting. Do you need specific crop information?
hoursBotResponse: Our office is open Monday-Friday from 8am to 5pm, and Saturday from 9am to 2pm. We're closed on Sundays.
pricingBotResponse: Pricing varies by service. For a detailed quote, please fill out our contact form or call us directly at (555) 123-4567.
locationBotResponse: We're located at 123 Farm Road, Rural County, State 12345. You can view our location on the map below the contact form.
contactSuccessMessage: Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you soon!
loginPrompt: You need to log in before sending a message.
contactErrorMessage: Failed to send message. Please try again.
whatsappPrompt: Would you like to chat with us on WhatsApp?

cta.title: Ready to Grow With Us?
cta.description: Join thousands of farmers who trust our products and services

featured.description_paragraph1: Discover the goodness and creativity of nature with our harvest of authentic local thyme carefully grown in an ideal natural environment. Our thyme is distinguished by its fragrant aroma and strong flavor that adds an exceptional touch to your recipes.
featured.description_paragraph2: It is grown using sustainable agricultural methods that ensure high quality and complete purity, making it the perfect choice for cooking, herbal tea, or traditional medicinal uses.

poultry.main_subtitle: Comprehensive care from day one to market-ready birds
poultry.description: We offer you the best broiler farming solutions that guarantee you high productivity and unmatched quality! We take care of every detail to ensure the health of the poultry and their rapid growth.

vitamins.title: Advanced Vitamins
vitamins.description: Fortified products ensure rapid growth & excellent performance

productivity.title: High Productivity
productivity.description: Optimal care leads to better meat quality & weight gain

poultry.stats_subtitle: Real results from our integrated approach

footer.brandDescription: Growing together for a greener future. We provide top-quality agricultural products and veterinary services to help your farm and animals thrive.
